BLACKNET OS - Documentation

Overview

BLACKNET OS is a powerful terminal-based hacking toolset. It includes various utilities like a web browser, port scanner, reverse shell, keylogger, and more.

Features

  • Web Engine: A terminal-based web browser that fetches and displays HTML content with links.
  • Port Scanner: Scans predefined ports on a target machine.
  • Backdoor: Creates a reverse shell listener on a specific IP and port.
  • Keylogger: Logs all keys pressed by the user in stdin mode.
  • LAN Sweep: Scans the local network for active devices.
  • Python Executor: Executes arbitrary Python code in a controlled environment.

Commands

browser    - Launches the terminal web browser
scan       - Scans for open ports
exec       - Executes arbitrary Python code
backdoor   - Starts a reverse shell listener
keylog     - Starts logging keystrokes
sweep      - Scans the local network for devices
clear      - Clears the terminal screen
exit       - Exit the program
